review.title: “Manager”
review.pros: Pros – Can improve your managing skills.Options to get another quick job.Better prospects of wide range of jobs.Be Punctual Disciplined and consistent.
review.cons: Cons – There is nothing much Disadvantage working with manager.The only thing is u should be working your time perfectly and thats it.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Excellent Managing skills at any time of the work.Very hard-working and punctual.Good at Technical things of the company.Best use of the current technology.
